title: Black as Night
description: Welcome to the Blumhouse is a film series consisting of theme-related anthological thriller-horror stories, developed and produced by Blumhouse Productions for Prime Video as Amazon Prime Originals. Announced as an ongoing collaboration between the companies, the films include \"distinctive vision and unique perspective on common themes\". The first four centered around \"family and love as redemptive or destructive forces\", while the next four releases will center around \"institutional horrors and personal phobias.\"
